description: Mixed media describes artwork in which more than one medium or material has been employed.
Common examples are earthenware, porcelain, and brick.
Painting is an important form of visual art, bringing in elements such as drawing, composition, gesture, narration, and abstraction.
Collage is a technique of art creation by which art results from an assemblage of different forms, thus creating a new whole.
The art or practice of taking and processing photographs.
Fiber art is a style of fine art which uses textiles such as fabric, yarn, and natural and synthetic fibers.
